originalText.text: Amazing beauty clinic with state of the art equipment. Every single person who I dealt with, including front desk, medical assistant, and PA were so welcoming, attentive and helpful. Will definitely recommend and come back.

text.text: Amazing beauty clinic with state of the art equipment. Every single person who I dealt with, including front desk, medical assistant, and PA were so welcoming, attentive and helpful. Will definitely recommend and come back.

originalText.text: First time visiting and she was so sweet and helpful during my consultation! Dr. Colette was the best on her advice and tips for my skin she truly is setting me in the right path to get my skin healthy and glowing again! Can’t wait to go back! I love her and her energy! Definitely recommend she’s very truthful and helpful!

originalText.text: I recently had a BBL Hero laser treatment at Clinique des Champs Élysées, and the experience was exceptional. The clinic itself boasts a serene environment, making the entire process comfortable from start to finish. Angelica, who performed the treatment, was incredibly professional, knowledgeable, and attentive to my needs and concerns. Hope the results will be outstanding.

text.text: I recently had a BBL Hero laser treatment at Clinique des Champs Élysées, and the experience was exceptional. The clinic itself boasts a serene environment, making the entire process comfortable from start to finish. Angelica, who performed the treatment, was incredibly professional, knowledgeable, and attentive to my needs and concerns. Hope the results will be outstanding.

originalText.text:
A Tranquil Oasis of Beauty and Wellness in the Heart of NYC

I recently had the pleasure of experiencing the Halo Facial at Clinique Des Champs Elysees New York, and I can't express enough how impressed I am with both the spa and the exceptional esthetician who took care of me.

From the moment I stepped into the spa, I was enveloped in an atmosphere of serenity and luxury. The chic and modern decor, combined with soothing ambient music, immediately set the tone for a rejuvenating experience. The staff were not only professional but also genuinely warm and welcoming, making me feel instantly comfortable.

My Halo Facial, expertly administered by a skilled esthetician, was nothing short of transformative. The attention to detail and personalized care I received were evident from start to finish. The treatment itself was a blissful combination of cutting-edge technology and skillful hands, leaving my skin with a radiant glow and a noticeable improvement in texture.

If you're seeking a sanctuary of beauty and wellness in the heart of New York City, look no further than Clinique Des Champs Elysees. This establishment exceeds expectations in every aspect. I wholeheartedly recommend Clinique Des Champs Elysees to anyone looking to indulge in a first-class medspa experience, and I eagerly anticipate my next visit to this exquisite haven of tranquility.

originalText.text:
The Clinique is really amazing! I went there for an Hydra Facial that I loved! It was better than any other facials I did in other institute.
I am now doing a laser hair removal treatment there and the results so far have been great. They use a painless machine which makes a huge difference!
